metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5748 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
qemu/qemu_monitor.c in libvirt allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (memory consumption) via a large QEMU reply.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5748` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirt-bin - 1.3.1-1ubuntu10.19
libvirt0 - 1.3.1-1ubuntu10.19
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvirt package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.1-1ubuntu10.19').
